price: No es así, sino que ese día no podrán ver a su Señor.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: ese día: El Día del Juicio Final.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
